pullRequest.title: Fix regression issue field indexes messed up for queries with fragments
pullRequest.bodyText:
Fix regression issue introduced after adding support fragments with directives. When query contains fragments and inline fragments at the same level, indexes used to reference GraphQL response fields (in ResponseField[] array) get out of order. This happens because we removed ResponseField.forString code generation for surrogate field Fragments. This fix reverts back changes that caused index to be out of order.
For info see original issue, but this is where it gets messed up:
https://github.com/apollographql/apollo-android/pull/1994/files#diff-4784749789d3edec94f885e8663e6246R81
Because this was missing:
https://github.com/apollographql/apollo-android/pull/1994/files#diff-4784749789d3edec94f885e8663e6246R46
Closes #1993

commit.message:
Fix regression issue field indexes messed up for queries with fragments

Fix regression issue introduced after adding support fragments with directives. When query contains fragments and inline fragments at the same level, indexes used to reference GraphQL response fields (in `ResponseField[]` array) get out of order. This happens because we removed `ResponseField.forString` code generation for surrogate field `Fragments`. This fix reverts back changes that caused index to be out of order.

Closes https://github.com/apollographql/apollo-android/issues/1993
